org.gcn.plinguacore.parser

Interface IParsersInfo

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IParsersClassProvider

    public interface IParsersInfo
    An interface to represent public information about available parsers
    Author:
    Research Group on Natural Computing (http://www.gcn.us.es)

      • getFileExtension

        java.lang.String getFileExtension(java.lang.String formatID)
        Gets the file extension of the format identified by the ID passed as argument
        Parameters:
        formatID - the ID of the format file whose file extension is required
        Returns:
        the file extension of the format file identified by the ID passed as argument
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the formatID is not a recognized format

        java.lang.String getFormatByExtension(java.lang.String extension)
        Gets the ID of the format file whose file extension is passed as argument
        Parameters:
        extension - the extension whose format file ID is required
        Returns:
        the ID of the format file identified by the extension passed as argument
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the extension is not a recognized file extension

      • getFormatByCommandLineOption

        java.lang.String getFormatByCommandLineOption(java.lang.String option)
        Gets the ID of the format file whose command-line option is passed as argument
        Parameters:
        option - the command-line option whose format file ID is required
        Returns:
        the ID of the format file identified by the command-line option passed as argument
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the option is not a recognized command-line option
